statements: DELETE FROM patient_consent_forms WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM patient_consent_forms WHERE form_id = 10 AND date_signed < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM patient_consent_forms WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe' AND blockchain_hash IS NULL;
DELETE FROM patient_consent_forms WHERE consent_date <= '2023-12-31' AND patient_id = 100;
DELETE FROM patients WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM blockchain_records WHERE block_hash = 'abc123' AND block_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM audit_trail WHERE action = 'deleted' AND action_date < '2022-01-01';
